name: Corporate Climb (Monday's Lunch)
description:
Climb and fight your way to the top of the corporate ladder using your fellow co-workers as stepping stones, literally. Stack the bodies of your work colleagues, knock the demonic managers out of the air and stop at nothing to get that promotion!

  Corporate Climb is a quick, fun arcade platformer where you try and see how many floors you can climb. It hosts a variety of enemies and achievements to add additional challenges. The achievements vary from not killing anyone to treating the floor as lava!

  Demonstrate how you would handle this hostile work environment!
